questions.text: The first public demonstration of either anesthesia was given by:
questions.explanation:
Solution:

Thomas Morton The first public demonstration of ether anesthesia was given by William Thomas Green Morton on 16th October 1846 for the removal of a jaw tumor at the hospital of Massachusetts and that is why 16th October is still celebrated as World Anesthesia Day (Ether Day).

questions.text: First spinal anesthesia in human beings was given by:
questions.explanation:
Solution:

August Bier The first spinal anesthesia in human beings was given by August Bier in 1898. He subjected himself to the first spinal anesthesia and was given by his colleague who was a physiologist

questions.text: Curare as a muscle relaxant was used first time in clinical practice by:
questions.explanation:
Solution:

Harold Griffith Curare is used by Amazon tribes for hunting their animals. Harold Griffith used curare as muscle relaxant for intubation.
